provider.name: OpenAI
provider.description: OpenAI's latest features and APIs are supported on Portkey.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey suports all of chat models offered by OpenAI

models.title: Embed
models.description: Portkey suports all embedding models offered by OpenAI

models.title: Vision
models.description: Portkey suports all vision models offered by OpenAI

models.title: Audio Transcriptions
models.description: Portkey suports all Audtio Transcription models offered by OpenAI

models.title: Audio Translations
models.description: Portkey suports all Audio Translation models offered by OpenAI

models.title: Create Speech
models.description: Portkey suports all text to speech models offered by OpenAI

models.title: Completions
models.description: Portkey suports all completions models offered by OpenAI

features.title: Function / Tool Calling
features.description: Function calling allows you to connect models like gpt-4o to external tools and systems.

features.title: Parallel Function / Tool Calling
features.description: With this feature you can generate multiple function calls in a single respons

features.title: Structured Outputs
features.description: Structured Outputs is a feature that ensures the model will always generate responses that adhere to your supplied JSON Schema.

features.title: Reproducible Outputs
features.description: OpenAI offers you some control towards deterministic outputs with this feature.

features.title: Reasoning
features.description: Reasoning models think before they answer, and can produce a long internal chain of thought before responding to the user.

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate OpenAI using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from OpenAI and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your OpenAI API key from the OpenAI website [here](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for gpt-4o-mini chat completions call on OpenAI using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for gpt-4o-mini chat completions call on OpenAI using virtual key

restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for gpt-4o-mini chat completions call on OpenAI using virtual key
